mapper.sql: SELECT id, name, abbreviation, address, postal_code, phone, fax, contacts, telephone, deposit_bank, email FROM tb_provider_info
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_provider_info( id, name, abbreviation, address, postal_code, phone, fax, contacts, telephone, deposit_bank, email ) VALUE(#{id}, #{name},#{abbreviation},#{address}, #{postalCode}, #{phone},#{fax},#{contacts},#{telephone},#{depositBank},#{email})
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_provider_info SET name=#{name}, abbreviation=#{abbreviation}, address=#{address}, postal_code=#{postalCode}, phone=#{phone}, fax=#{fax}, contacts=#{contacts}, telephone=#{telephone}, deposit_bank=#{depositBank}, email=#{email} WHERE id=#{id}
